channel.title: AM Colonization on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in AM Colonization on funPlantGenes

item.title: GhWAK13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A05G2392 Gene Symbol: GhWAK13 Gene Name: wall-associated kinase 13 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Wall-associated kinase GhWAK13 mediates arbuscular mycorrhizal symbiosis and Verticillium wilt resistance in cotton.

item.title: MdGH3-12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1290900 Gene Symbol: MdGH3-12 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdGH3-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD02G1180300 Gene Symbol: MdGH3-2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MtZIP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr6g007687 Gene Symbol: MtZIP14 Gene Name: Zn-regulated iron-regulated transporter-like protein 14 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Suggesting that increased colonization by the AM fungus is associated with increased expression of MtZIP14 The putative Zn transporter gene MtZIP14 was markedly up-regulated in M.

item.title: OsZAS
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os09g15240 RAPdb gene ID: Os09g0321200 Gene Symbol: OsZAS Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: Sl-IAA27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g120500.2.1 Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA27 Gene Name: Aux/IAA gene Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Sl-IAA27 regulates strigolactone biosynthesis and mycorrhization in tomato.

item.title: SlCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCCD7 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 7 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlCCD7 controls strigolactone biosynthesis, shoot branching and mycorrhiza-induced apocarotenoid formation in tomato.

item.title: SlPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g060920 Gene Symbol: SlPHR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We determine that SlSPX1 integrates Pi signaling and AM symbiosis by directly interacting with a set of arbuscule-induced SlPHR proteins (SlPHR1, SlPHR4, SlPHR10, SlPHR11, and SlPHR12).
